flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
This project is going to show you how to hook up your phone to your stereo all for under $10! First, hook up telephone cable to telephone jack, Second, hook up alligator clips, red to red and black to green, third, hook up LR to your alligator clips, black to black and red to red. Fourth, hook 8th inch to your stereo. Now your done, if you hear buzzing, jiggle all the cords.

Youtube User 22408aaron
guide.introduction_rendered:
This project is going to show you how to hook up your phone to your stereo all for under $10! First, hook up telephone cable to telephone jack, Second, hook up alligator clips, red to red and black to green, third, hook up LR to your alligator clips, black to black and red to red. Fourth, hook 8th inch to your stereo. Now your done, if you hear buzzing, jiggle all the cords.

Youtube User 22408aaron

Relevant parts
  • Telephone with data port, Stereo with audio in port, telephone cord and jack, 8th inch to LR cable, alligator clips, (optional) Tape recorder

parts.text: Telephone with data port, Stereo with audio in port, telephone cord and jack, 8th inch to LR cable, alligator clips, (optional)  Tape recorder

guide.summary: In this project, we will show you how to hook up your phone to your stereo.
guide.title: The Stereo-Phone
